name: DRIFTYBOI
description:
NOTE : Unlike my other projects that are only available for PC this is available on PC and Mac because I made this on my MacBook Pro.

This game was inspired by Jelly Drift by Dani.  I have left a link to his video in the game.  The soundtrack to jelly drift also goes with the game really well.  This is why I didn't  include any music in the game.  There is a link to the song in the game as well I recommend listening to it while you play!

There are a total of 5 levels.  Each becoming harder.

CONTROLS 

WASD to move 

SPACE for your E-Break

MOUSE to look around

Space while going at high speeds and rapidly turning will allow you to drift!

SKKKRRRT SKKKRRRT!!!!
